contentrichtext.text: {{unreferenced|date=March 2008}} {{Infobox Prime Minister | name = Frédéric François-Marsal | image = Francois-marchal.jpg | order = 90th [[Prime Minister of France]] | term_start = 8 June 1924 | term_end = 15 June 1924 | president = [[Alexandre Millerand]]<br>''Himself'' (acting)<br>[[Gaston Doumergue]] | predecessor = [[Raymond Poincaré]] | successor = [[Édouard Herriot]] | order2 = [[List of Presidents of the French Republic|Acting President of the French Republic]] | term_start2 = 11 June 1924 | term_end2 = 13 June 1924 | primeminister2 = ''Himself'' | predecessor2 = [[Alexandre Millerand]] | successor2 = [[Gaston Doumergue]] | birth_date = 16 March 1874 | birth_place = Paris | death_date = {{death date and age|1958|5|20|1874|3|16}} | death_place = [[Gisors]] | party = None }} '''Frédéric François-Marsal''' ({{IPA-fr|fʁedeʁik fʁɑ̃swa maʁsal|lang}}; 1874–1958)<!--full dates in infobox, per MOS--> was a French Politician of the [[French Third Republic|Third Republic]], who served briefly as [[Prime Minister of France|Prime Minister]] in 1924. Due to his premiership he also served for two days (11–13 June 1924) as the Acting President of the French Republic between resignation of [[Alexandre Millerand]] and election of [[Gaston Doumergue]]. ==François-Marsal's Ministry, 8–15 June 1924== *Frédéric François-Marsal- President of the Council and Minister of Finance *[[Edmond Lefebvre du Prey]] - Minister of Foreign Affairs *[[André Maginot]] - Minister of War *[[Justin de Selves]] - Minister of the Interior *[[Paul Jourdain]] - Minister of Labour and Hygiene *[[Antony Ratier]] - Minister of Justice *[[Désiré Ferry]] - Minister of Marine *[[Adolphe Landry]] - Minister of Public Instruction, Fine Arts, and Technical Education *[[Joseph Capus]] - Minister of Agriculture *[[Jean Fabry]] - Minister of Colonies *[[Yves Le Trocquer]] - Minister of Public Works, Ports, and Marine *[[Pierre Étienne Flandin]] - Minister of Commerce, Industry, Posts, and Telegraphs *[[Louis Marin]] - Minister of Liberated Regions {{s-start}} {{s-off}} {{succession box|title=[[List of Prime Ministers of France|Prime Minister of France]]|before=[[Raymond Poincaré]]|after=[[Édouard Herriot]]|years=1924}} {{s-end}} {{Heads of government of France}} {{Heads of state of France}} {{Authority control|VIAF=30724878|GND=133360423}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Francois-Marsal, Frederic | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = French politician Prime Minister of France | DATE OF BIRTH = 16 March 1874 | PLACE OF BIRTH = Paris | DATE OF DEATH = 20 May 1958 | PLACE OF DEATH = [[Gisors]] }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Francois-Marsal, Frederic}} [[Category:1874 births]] [[Category:1958 deaths]] [[Category:Politicians from Paris]] [[Category:Prime Ministers of France]] [[Category:French Ministers of Finance]] {{France-politician-stub}}
